name: Wingate by Wyndham Aberdeen /Edgewood

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel appeared clean, location was great (we were attending a wedding), breakfast was included...3 people total in two separate rooms and a day latewr we all had bumps in our feet, back and arms. Medical evalutation confirmed it was due to bed bugs!
reviews.title: Bed Bugs!!

reviews.text: Very friendly staff! Free salad bar when i cam inn late. They were renovating the hotel when i was there, but it was during daytime so i didn´t notice anything. A little unipersonal. Many fast food chains around if you like that. Close to a lot of businesses in the are and right off the main road. No extra charging for all the amenities!
reviews.title: Grate for business travelers!

reviews.text: I stayed there on a business trip for my company, and the hotel was nice inside but had bed bugs. I will NEVER stay there again. The front desk lady was rude to me or she doesn't know how to talk to people right. I can't remember her name but she was very pregnant. Overall the hotel needs improvement.
reviews.title: Bad hotel

reviews.text: When we checked in there were fresh baked cookies available and some munchy happy hour food to take off the edge from a long day at work. We were greeted with a smile, very friendly and helpful staff. I believe the person I spoke to was the Manager and she was very helpful in accomodating our needs. The beds were comfortable and the down comforter made for a very restful night. Breakfast in the morning was a real treat they had a wide variety of foods (from healthy to hearty) something for everyone. They had fresh baked scones, hard boiled eggs, make your own waffles, french toast sticks and breakfast sandwiches (VERY NICE SPREAD) Overall a very pleasant experience. When I have to come back to the area I will definitely give this hotel another try. I highly recommend...
reviews.title: Great Hotel! Great Staff! Alot Of Extras For The $

reviews.text: I was surprised by the large and Clean room for the money. Night Front Desk was unfriendly and had an i-dont-care-attitude but rest of the staff were nice . Close to I-95, gas stations, restaurants. Housekeeping, wired and wireless internet and Enery Saver CFL Lights were a plus. I ran into large groups of baseball kids but was I wasn't on the same floor.
reviews.title: Great location but Front Desk needs work

reviews.text: crappy service. management [--], don't careresh attitude. breakfast horrible!!! ownership is atrocious, very nasty people at corporate level!!!
reviews.title: horrible and atrocious owner!!!
Some Problems With New Staff
reviews.text: As in every hotel, there was good and bad. We had stayed at a Country Inn & Suites down the street the last time, and it was super in all areas, but no indoor pool, so this time we picked Wingate because of the indoor pool. We figured the other amenities would be about the same. We were a little disapointed. Not in the indoor pool, but the breakfast was not quite as nice as the Comfort, and they seemed to have a housekeeping staff problem. I think most of them were new. They only left the minimum in linens in the bathroom. It seemed we were always having to ask for things. The housekeeping staff sometimes didn't seem to know the policy on what was expected of them. They seemed to try and get by with just the minimum on cleaning the room. We were told the glasses and cups, which were really glass, not paper, weren't replaced daily. We were responisble for cleaning them. An extra pillow was delivered without a pillow case because the girl said they didn't have any more. It seemed to be more of a management training problem than anything, but the aggravation of the little nit picking things became a little annoying. It seemed we were always having to go beyond asking just the maid. We were there two weeks on business, but might try another one next time.

reviews.title: Love the Breakfast
reviews.text: I loved this hotel. But the problem of too many litle league baseball players running up and down the hallway was a issue at night. The working staff tried their hardest but when i addressed it the following morning to a ken the GM manager he was rude and very inconsiderate. I don't recommend that you stay here during summer and fall season.

reviews.title: Great Hotel
reviews.text: I stayed here on 11/1/04. What an amazing hotel. The staff is friendly and the hotel very clean and in a great area.
I stayed in Wingate Inn - Aberdeen from Monday 04/14/2008 to Friday 04/18/2008.
reviews.title: An unpleasant experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Wednesday night, I ordered extra take out dinner so I can have something to eat on Thursday night.
reviews.title: Some good, some bad

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: On Thursday 4/17/2008 I had a bad experience : I came back to the hotel at 8:00 and found out my food disappeared from the refrigerator and they didn't change my diry sheet.
reviews.title: Great Experience

likes.disliked: — It was all great...I guess that I couldnt stay longer...:-)

reviews.text: I put in a complaint to the front desk and the front desk person said she will tell the manger but the next morning the manager did nothing about it. They didn't offer to pay me back for my food nor offer sorry for causing me so much inconvenience.
reviews.title: Wonderful staff

likes.liked: — The friendliness of the staff and the cleanliness of the hotel

reviews.text: It's experience of bad customer services and dirty house keeping.
reviews.title: Great Place Great Value, Highly recommend

likes.disliked: — Check it out-This hotel is a hidden secret- you will not be disappointed

reviews.text: I have nothing but positive things to say about this hotel. From the minute we arrived until the minute we left. Staff was so helpful!! Room was spotless!! Everything was great!! Location was good too. Plenty of resturants, fast food, stores walking distance. The hotel was loaded with baseball teams of children (all ages) but I have to say it was very quiet. I would stay again! Thank you staff for taking lots of pride in your work!! It shows!!
reviews.title: Great Experience!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed 2/19/10 through 2/21/10. Supposedly breakfast was until 10 AM but after 9:15 it was virtually non existant(No eggs or bacon) To top it off we left cash for the maid each day. However, on Sunday 2/21 she took the money but did not clean the room or make the bed. I complained to the person on duty that night about it but the only thing she could do was offer another room. Who wants to move at 10 P>M. in the evening with all their belongings. The experience here was VERY SAD AND A SORRY STATE OF AFFAIRS- WHO IS CHECKING UP???
reviews.title: very poor

reviews.text: I needed to be in Belcamp/Aberdeen the week of February 15-19 for business. I had never heard of a Wingate Hotel, but decided to give it a try. What a beautiful hotel with free breakfast, high speed internet, indoor pool and spa and exercise room. The rooms are very big and have microwave ovens and refrigerators. This was great, because I needed to spend the week and wanted to have some of my own food available. The staff was friendly and knowledgeable and helped me get around the area. The hotel is also close to good restaurants, food stores and other retail. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone traveling on business and for vacation. In fact, I will be there again next month. It will be like going to a good friends house again and I look forward to my next trip there. Oh and yes, the price is very affordable and beats several of the better know hotels in the area.
reviews.title: One of nicest hotels in the area and a great value for your money

reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel on the way down to Florida. All aspects of our stay were excellent - from the kindness and helpfulness of the front desk, the wonderful heated pool and bubbling spa which was great on the sore body after a full day in the car, the extremely clean and comfortable room, to the bountiful breakfast (eggs, bacon, bagels, danish, waffles, yogurt, cold cereals, etc). There was nothing lacking during this stay - oh wait - yes, there was - I saw no hint of the bedbugs mentioned in the previous reviews. A definite 5 out of 5 and would stay again - no question.
reviews.title: Great experience - would definitely stay again!

reviews.text: We stayed, this time, for one night. Have stayed here in the past. The prices are right and its close to Rt 95. The room has a microwave and breakfast is available for free each moringing.
reviews.title: Great Place, Nice Price

aka: Wingate By Wyndham Aberdeen / Belcamp Hotel Belcamp
